New Records: Jack Leiter allowed three runs over five-plus innings, striking out a career-high six batters and inducing 20 swings and misses, tying for the fourth-most among Texas pitchers this season. His 12 swings and misses on his four-seam fastball tied for the second most by a Rangers pitcher in 2024
Key Match Events: Jack Leiter allowed a home run to Taylor Ward on his third pitch of the game but bounced back to lead the Rangers to a 6-4 win. The game was marked by Leiter's composure and ability to limit the Angels' lineup despite a rough start
Post-Match Reflections: Rangers' shortstop Josh Smith praised Leiter's performance, emphasizing his growth and impact on the team's win. Leiter himself reflected on his improved composure and focus in the MLB
Miscellaneous Highlights: Leiter's ability to slow down and control his adrenaline during the game was highlighted as a key factor in his performance. His growing comfort and routine in the big league level were also noted
